original_text: And the whole city was filled with confusion: and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus, men of Macedonia, Paul's companions in travel, they rushed with one accord into the theatre.
korean_text: 온 시내가 요란하여 바울과 같이 다니는 마게도냐 사람 가이오와 아리스다고를 붙들어 일제히 연극장으로 달려 들어가는지라

sentences.original_text: And the whole city was filled with confusion
and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus
they rushed with one accord into the theatre
